Data source comes from The Shadowlands Haunted Place Index. 

[TidyTuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday) is a weekly data project aimed at improving skills in data manipulation, visualization and analysis using R programming language. [This week](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/blob/master/data/2023/2023-02-07/readme.md), we are exploring daily stock prices and volume of 14 different tech companies. You are welcome to review my code [here](https://github.com/zwguo95/TidyTuesday/tree/main/2023/0207)!
